schools.name: Mt Olive High School
schools.school-summary: Mt Olive High School, a public school located in Mount Olive, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Mount Olive Community Unit School District 5.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Mount Olive Community Unit School District 5
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Mt Olive Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Mt Olive Elementary School, a public school located in Mount Olive, IL, serves grades PK-8 in the Mount Olive Community Unit School District 5.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Mount Olive Community Unit School District 5
